item.title: Wild Ride
item.description: Myrtl and Hog jumped down the chute, with Myrtl crying out in sheer revelry: “Whoo-hoo”. They had been going about this for months on end now and the thrill had not diminished as of yet. The hustle and bustle of the city combined with the rush of being chased, it was just too good to be true. After the garbage chute there would be one more challenge before losing in on their home: the bus station.
